member.summary: Parses a binary message from a byte array. Automatically detects whether this is a request (31-byte header) or response (16-byte header).
member.returns: Parsed binary message

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Connect.Protocol.BinaryMessage.ToByteArray
member.summary: Serializes the binary message to a byte array. Uses 31-byte header for requests, 16-byte header for responses.
member.returns: Complete message as byte array

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Connect.Protocol.BinaryMessage.ExpectsResponse
member.summary: Returns true if this message expects a response.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Connect.Protocol.BinaryMessage.IsResponse
member.summary: Returns true if this message is a response to another message.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Connect.Protocol.BinaryMessage.IsClientRouted
member.summary: Returns true if this message should be routed to a client (not a service).

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Connect.Protocol.BinaryMessage.IsHighPriority
member.summary: Returns true if this message has high priority.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Connect.Protocol.BinaryMessage.IsSuccess
member.summary: Returns true if this is a successful response (ResponseCode is 0). Only meaningful for response messages.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Connect.Protocol.BinaryMessage.IsError
member.summary: Returns true if this is an error response (ResponseCode is non-zero). Only meaningful for response messages.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Connect.Protocol.BinaryMessage.IsMeta
member.summary: Returns true if this message requests endpoint metadata instead of executing the endpoint. When set, the Channel field specifies the meta type: 0 = endpoint-info, 1 = request-schema, 2 = response-schema, 3 = full-schema.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Connect.Protocol.BinaryMessage.ToString
member.summary: Returns a string representation of the message for debugging.

member.name: T:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Connect.Protocol.MessageFlags
member.summary: Bit flags controlling message behavior in the enhanced 31-byte binary protocol. These flags provide zero-copy routing and performance optimizations.

member.name: F:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Connect.Protocol.MessageFlags.None
member.summary: Default - JSON text, service request, unencrypted, standard priority, expects response

member.name: F:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Connect.Protocol.MessageFlags.Binary
member.summary: Message payload is binary data (not JSON)

member.name: F:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Connect.Protocol.MessageFlags.Encrypted
member.summary: Message payload is encrypted

member.name: F:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Connect.Protocol.MessageFlags.Compressed
member.summary: Message payload is compressed (gzip)

member.name: F:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Connect.Protocol.MessageFlags.HighPriority
member.summary: Deliver at high priority, skip to front of queues

member.name: F:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Connect.Protocol.MessageFlags.Event
member.summary: Fire-and-forget message, no response expected

member.name: F:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Connect.Protocol.MessageFlags.Client
member.summary: Route to another WebSocket client (not a Bannou service)

member.name: F:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Connect.Protocol.MessageFlags.Response
member.summary: Message is a response to an RPC (not a new request)

member.name: F:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Connect.Protocol.MessageFlags.Meta
member.summary: Request metadata about endpoint instead of executing it. When set, the Channel field specifies the meta type: 0 = endpoint-info, 1 = request-schema, 2 = response-schema, 3 = full-schema. Connect service transforms the path and routes to companion endpoints.

member.name: T:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Connect.Protocol.NetworkByteOrder
member.summary: Network byte order utilities for cross-platform binary protocol compatibility. Ensures consistent endianness across all client and server implementations.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Connect.Protocol.NetworkByteOrder.WriteUInt16(System.Span{System.Byte},System.UInt16)
member.summary: Writes a 16-bit unsigned integer in network byte order (big-endian).

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Connect.Protocol.NetworkByteOrder.WriteUInt32(System.Span{System.Byte},System.UInt32)
member.summary: Writes a 32-bit unsigned integer in network byte order (big-endian).

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Connect.Protocol.NetworkByteOrder.WriteUInt64(System.Span{System.Byte},System.UInt64)
member.summary: Writes a 64-bit unsigned integer in network byte order (big-endian).

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Connect.Protocol.NetworkByteOrder.ReadUInt16(System.ReadOnlySpan{System.Byte})
member.summary: Reads a 16-bit unsigned integer from network byte order (big-endian).

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Connect.Protocol.NetworkByteOrder.ReadUInt32(System.ReadOnlySpan{System.Byte})
member.summary: Reads a 32-bit unsigned integer from network byte order (big-endian).

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Connect.Protocol.NetworkByteOrder.ReadUInt64(System.ReadOnlySpan{System.Byte})
member.summary: Reads a 64-bit unsigned integer from network byte order (big-endian).

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Connect.Protocol.NetworkByteOrder.WriteGuid(System.Span{System.Byte},System.Guid)
member.summary: Writes a GUID in consistent network byte order. Uses RFC 4122 standard byte ordering for cross-platform compatibility.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Connect.Protocol.NetworkByteOrder.ReadGuid(System.ReadOnlySpan{System.Byte})
member.summary: Reads a GUID from consistent network byte order. Uses RFC 4122 standard byte ordering for cross-platform compatibility.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Connect.Protocol.NetworkByteOrder.IsNetworkByteOrderSupported
member.summary: Validates that the current system can handle network byte order operations. Returns true if BinaryPrimitives are available (should always be true in .NET Core/5+).

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Connect.Protocol.NetworkByteOrder.GetSystemEndianness
member.summary: Gets information about the current system's endianness for debugging.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Connect.Protocol.NetworkByteOrder.TestNetworkByteOrderCompatibility
member.summary: Tests cross-platform compatibility of network byte order operations. Useful for unit testing and validation.

member.name: T:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Connect.Protocol.GuidGenerator
member.summary: Dependency-free GUID generation utilities for client-server security. Provides client-salted GUIDs to prevent cross-session exploitation.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Connect.Protocol.GuidGenerator.GenerateServiceGuid(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Generates a client-salted GUID for a service endpoint. Each client gets unique GUIDs for identical services, preventing security exploits.
member.param: Optional additional entropy for specialized use cases
member.returns: Deterministic but unique GUID for this session-service combination

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Connect.Protocol.GuidGenerator.GenerateClientGuid(System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Generates a client-to-client routing GUID for P2P communication.
member.returns: GUID for client-to-client message routing

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Connect.Protocol.GuidGenerator.GenerateSessionShortcutGuid(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Generates a client-salted GUID for a session shortcut. Uses UUID version 7 bits to distinguish from service GUIDs (version 5) and client-to-client GUIDs (version 6).
member.returns: Deterministic but unique GUID for this session-shortcut combination

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Connect.Protocol.GuidGenerator.IsSessionShortcutGuid(System.Guid)
member.summary: Validates that a GUID is a session shortcut GUID (version 7). Useful for detecting shortcut GUIDs vs service GUIDs (v5) or client GUIDs (v6).
member.returns: True if the GUID has version 7 bits set (session shortcut)

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Connect.Protocol.GuidGenerator.IsServiceGuid(System.Guid)
member.summary: Validates that a GUID is a service GUID (version 5).
member.returns: True if the GUID has version 5 bits set (service capability)

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Connect.Protocol.GuidGenerator.IsClientGuid(System.Guid)
member.summary: Validates that a GUID is a client-to-client GUID (version 6).
member.returns: True if the GUID has version 6 bits set (client-to-client routing)

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Connect.Protocol.GuidGenerator.GenerateMessageId
member.summary: Generates a unique message ID for request/response correlation. Uses timestamp and entropy for uniqueness.
member.returns: Unique message ID

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Connect.Protocol.GuidGenerator.ValidateServiceGuid(System.Guid,System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Validates that a GUID was generated by this system. Useful for detecting tampered or externally-generated GUIDs.
member.param: Session ID that should have generated this GUID
member.returns: True if the GUID is valid for these parameters

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Connect.Protocol.GuidGenerator.GenerateServerSalt
member.summary: Creates a server salt with cryptographic randomness. Should be generated once per server instance and reused.
member.returns: Cryptographically secure server salt

member.name: T:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Connect.Protocol.ConnectionState

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Connect.Protocol.ConnectionState.SessionId
member.summary: Unique session ID for this connection

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Connect.Protocol.ConnectionState.ConnectedAt
member.summary: When this connection was established

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Connect.Protocol.ConnectionState.LastActivity
member.summary: Last activity timestamp for connection management

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Connect.Protocol.ConnectionState.ServiceMappings
member.summary: Service GUID mappings for this session (service name -> GUID)

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Connect.Protocol.ConnectionState.GuidMappings
member.summary: Reverse GUID mappings for routing (GUID -> service name)

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Connect.Protocol.ConnectionState.ChannelSequences
member.summary: Per-channel sequence numbers for message ordering

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Connect.Protocol.ConnectionState.PendingMessages
member.summary: Pending messages awaiting responses (Message ID -> Request Info)

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Connect.Protocol.ConnectionState.Flags
member.summary: Connection flags and capabilities

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Connect.Protocol.ConnectionState.PeerGuid
member.summary: Unique GUID for peer-to-peer routing. Other connections can route messages to this connection using this GUID. Generated on connection establishment and stable for the connection lifetime.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Connect.Protocol.ConnectionState.SessionShortcuts
member.summary: Session shortcuts indexed by route GUID. Uses ConcurrentDictionary for thread-safe access without explicit locks. Shortcuts are session-scoped and not persisted to Redis.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Connect.Protocol.ConnectionState.ShortcutsByService
member.summary: Index for bulk revocation by source service. Maps source service name to set of route GUIDs from that service.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Connect.Protocol.ConnectionState.ReconnectionToken
member.summary: Token for reconnecting to this session (generated on disconnect, valid for reconnection window)

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Connect.Protocol.ConnectionState.ReconnectionExpiresAt
member.summary: When the reconnection window expires (5 minutes after disconnect)

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Connect.Protocol.ConnectionState.DisconnectedAt
member.summary: When the connection was disconnected (null if still connected)

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Connect.Protocol.ConnectionState.UserRoles
member.summary: User roles at time of disconnect (preserved for reconnection)

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Connect.Protocol.ConnectionState.IsInReconnectionWindow
member.summary: Whether this session is in reconnection window (disconnected but not expired)

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Connect.Protocol.ConnectionState.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Creates a new connection state.

member.summary: Clears all service mappings (used before rebuilding capabilities, thread-safe).

member.summary: Tries to get a service name from a GUID (thread-safe).

member.summary: Gets expired pending messages for cleanup.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Connect.Protocol.ConnectionState.UpdateActivity

Request model for WebSocket connection establishment.
Currently contains no specific fields but extends the base ApiRequest.

member.name: T:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Connect.ConnectionData
member.summary:
Connection state data returned for connection service requests.
Currently a placeholder for future connection metadata.

member.name: T:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Connect.ResponseCodes
member.summary:
Response codes used in the binary protocol for success/error indication.
Provides fine-grained error reporting for different failure scenarios.
**Broadcast error codes (40-49):**
- 40 (BroadcastNotAllowed): Broadcast attempted in External mode where it is forbidden
**Shortcut-specific error codes (70-79):**
- 70 (ShortcutExpired): Session shortcut has expired (TTL exceeded)
- 71 (ShortcutTargetNotFound): Shortcut's target capability no longer available
- 72 (ShortcutRevoked): Session shortcut was explicitly revoked

member.name: T:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Connect.ServiceRequestMessage
member.summary:
Structure of a service request message in the enhanced 31-byte binary protocol.
This schema is for documentation - actual messages are binary.
**Binary Header Layout (31 bytes):**
- Bytes 0: Message Flags (1 byte)
- Bytes 1-2: Channel ID (2 bytes, big-endian)
- Bytes 3-6: Sequence Number (4 bytes, big-endian)
- Bytes 7-22: Service GUID (16 bytes)
- Bytes 23-30: Message ID (8 bytes)
- Bytes 31+: Payload (variable length)

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Connect.ServiceRequestMessage.Flags
member.summary: Bit flags controlling message behavior (binary, encrypted, compressed, etc.)

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Connect.ServiceRequestMessage.Channel
member.summary: Channel for sequential message processing (0-65535, 0 = default)

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Connect.ServiceRequestMessage.SequenceNumber
member.summary: Per-channel sequence number for message ordering

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Connect.ServiceRequestMessage.ServiceGuid
member.summary: Client-salted service GUID for routing

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Connect.ServiceRequestMessage.MessageId
member.summary: Unique message ID for request/response correlation

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Connect.ServiceRequestMessage.Payload
member.summary: Message payload (JSON or binary data based on flags)

member.name: T:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Connect.ServiceResponseMessage
member.summary:
Structure of a service response message in the enhanced 31-byte binary protocol.
This schema is for documentation - actual messages are binary.
**Binary Header Layout (31 bytes):**
- Same as ServiceRequestMessage but with Response flag (0x40) set

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Connect.ServiceResponseMessage.Flags
member.summary: Must have Response flag (0x40) set

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Connect.ServiceResponseMessage.Channel
member.summary: Matches the request channel

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Connect.ServiceResponseMessage.SequenceNumber
member.summary: Matches the request sequence number

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Connect.ServiceResponseMessage.ServiceGuid
member.summary: Matches the request service GUID

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Connect.ServiceResponseMessage.MessageId
member.summary: Matches the request message ID

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Connect.ServiceResponseMessage.ResponseCode
member.summary: Response status code indicating success or specific error condition

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Connect.ServiceResponseMessage.Payload
member.summary: Optional response payload

member.summary: Configuration for instantiate-on-access behavior

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Actor.AutoSpawnConfig.Enabled
member.summary: If true, accessing a non-existent actor creates it

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Actor.AutoSpawnConfig.IdPattern
member.summary:
Regex pattern for actor IDs that trigger auto-spawn.
Examples: "npc-.*" matches "npc-grok", "npc-merchant-123"

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Actor.AutoSpawnConfig.MaxInstances
member.summary: Maximum auto-spawned instances (0 = unlimited)

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Actor.AutoSpawnConfig.CharacterIdCaptureGroup
member.summary:
1-based regex capture group index for extracting CharacterId from actor ID.
Example: With idPattern "npc-brain-([a-f0-9-]+)" and characterIdCaptureGroup: 1,
actor ID "npc-brain-abc-123-def" extracts "abc-123-def" as CharacterId (parsed as GUID).

member.name: T:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Actor.PerceptionData
member.summary:
Data representing a perception event for an actor.
Spatial context can be provided in two ways (hybrid approach):
1. Typed: Use the optional spatialContext field for structured spatial data
2. Schema-less: Use perceptionType="spatial" with data containing spatial info
The typed approach is recommended when game server has structured spatial data.
The schema-less approach allows flexibility for game-specific spatial formats.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Actor.PerceptionData.PerceptionType
member.summary:
Perception type. Common values: visual, auditory, tactile, olfactory,
proprioceptive, spatial. Use "spatial" for schema-less spatial data in 'data' field.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Actor.PerceptionData.SourceId
member.summary: ID of the entity causing this perception

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Actor.PerceptionData.SourceType
member.summary: Type of source (character, npc, object, environment)

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Actor.PerceptionData.Data
member.summary:
Perception-specific data. For perceptionType="spatial", this can contain
game-specific spatial context in any format the game server defines.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Actor.PerceptionData.Urgency
member.summary: How urgent this perception is (0-1)

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Actor.PerceptionData.SpatialContext
member.summary:
Optional typed spatial context from game server's local spatial state.
Provides structured information about terrain, nearby objects, hazards, etc.
Alternative to using perceptionType="spatial" with schema-less data.

member.name: T:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Actor.SpatialContext
member.summary:
Spatial context derived from game server's authoritative spatial state.
Included in perception events to give NPC actors awareness of their environment
without requiring direct map subscriptions.
Note: additionalProperties=true allows game-specific extensions.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Actor.SpatialContext.TerrainType
member.summary: Terrain type at character position (grass, stone, water, etc.)

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Actor.SpatialContext.Elevation
member.summary: Elevation at character position

member.name: T:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Actor.QueryOptionsRequest
member.summary:
Query an actor for its available options. Options are maintained by the actor
in its state.memories.{queryType}_options and returned based on requested freshness.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Actor.QueryOptionsRequest.ActorId
member.summary: ID of the actor to query

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Actor.QueryOptionsRequest.QueryType
member.summary: Type of options to query

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Actor.QueryOptionsRequest.Freshness
member.summary:
Requested freshness level. Defaults to 'cached'.
- fresh: Inject context and wait for actor to recompute
- cached: Return cached options if within maxAgeMs
- stale_ok: Return whatever is cached, even if expired

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Actor.QueryOptionsRequest.MaxAgeMs
member.summary:
Maximum age of cached options in milliseconds (for 'cached' freshness).
Defaults to 5000ms. If cached options are older, behavior depends on
freshness level.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Actor.QueryOptionsRequest.Context
member.summary:
Optional context for the query. When provided with freshness='fresh',
this context is injected as a perception to the actor, triggering
context-sensitive option recomputation.

member.name: T:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Actor.QueryOptionsResponse
member.summary: Response containing the actor's available options

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Actor.QueryOptionsResponse.ActorId
member.summary: ID of the queried actor

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Actor.QueryOptionsResponse.QueryType
member.summary: Type of options returned

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Actor.QueryOptionsResponse.Options
member.summary: Available options for the queried type

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Actor.QueryOptionsResponse.ComputedAt
member.summary: When these options were last computed by the actor

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Actor.QueryOptionsResponse.AgeMs
member.summary: Age of options in milliseconds (now - computedAt)

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Actor.QueryOptionsResponse.CharacterContext
member.summary:
Character-specific context that influenced these options.
Only present for character-based actors.

member.name: T:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Actor.OptionsQueryType
member.summary:
Type of options to query. Actors maintain options in state.memories.{type}_options.
Well-known types are defined; actors can also expose custom types.

member.name: T:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Actor.OptionsFreshness
member.summary: Controls caching behavior for options queries

member.name: T:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Actor.ActorOption
member.summary:
A single option available to the actor. The standardized fields enable
Event Brain to reason about options; additional fields allow actor-specific data.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Actor.ActorOption.ActionId
member.summary:
Unique identifier for this action within the option type.
Examples: "sword_slash", "greet_friendly", "climb_wall"

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Actor.ActorOption.Preference
member.summary:
How much the actor prefers this option (0-1), based on personality,
combat preferences, current state, etc. Higher = more preferred.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Actor.ActorOption.Risk
member.summary: Estimated risk of this action (0=safe, 1=very risky)

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Actor.ActorOption.Available
member.summary: Whether this option is currently available (requirements met)

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Actor.ActorOption.Requirements
member.summary: Requirements that must be met for this option

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Actor.ActorOption.CooldownMs
member.summary: Milliseconds until this option becomes available again (if on cooldown)

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Actor.ActorOption.Tags
member.summary: Tags for categorization (e.g., ["melee", "aggressive", "loud"])

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Actor.ActorOption.AdditionalProperties
member.summary: Gets or sets additional properties not defined in the schema.

member.name: T:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Actor.OptionsQueryContext
member.summary:
Context provided with a fresh query. Injected as a perception to the actor
to trigger context-sensitive option recomputation.

member.summary: Current combat state (approaching, engaged, retreating, etc.)

member.summary: Environment tags (indoor, elevated, destructibles, narrow, etc.)

member.summary: How urgent is this query (affects option prioritization)

member.summary: Actor-specific context data

member.summary: Gets or sets additional properties not defined in the schema.

member.summary: Character's combat style (aggressive, defensive, balanced, etc.)

member.name: T:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Actor.ChoreographyInstruction
member.summary:
Instruction sent to a participant actor by Event Brain to execute a choreographed sequence.
Delivered via emit_perception with perception_type "choreography_instruction".

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Actor.ChoreographyInstruction.EncounterId
member.summary: ID of the coordinated encounter this instruction belongs to

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Actor.ChoreographyInstruction.SequenceId
member.summary:
Unique ID for this sequence within the choreography.
Used for acknowledgment and sync point coordination.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Actor.ChoreographyInstruction.Actions
member.summary:
Ordered list of actions for the participant to execute.
Multiple actions allow for combos or reaction sequences.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Actor.ChoreographyInstruction.Timing
member.summary: When and how to start executing this sequence

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Actor.ChoreographyInstruction.Priority
member.summary:
How strongly to prefer this choreography over actor's own choices.
Higher priority may interrupt current actions.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Actor.ChoreographyInstruction.CanInterrupt
member.summary:
Whether participant can interrupt the sequence if a better opportunity arises.
If false, participant should complete the sequence unless impossible.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Actor.ChoreographyInstruction.ExpectedOutcome
member.summary:
Expected outcome of this sequence (e.g., "hit", "miss", "block").
Used for coordinating reactions with other participants.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Actor.ChoreographyInstruction.OnComplete
member.summary:
Event to emit when sequence completes (e.g., "sync_point.attack_landed").
Other participants may be waiting on this.

member.name: T:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Actor.ChoreographyAction
member.summary:
A single action within a choreographed sequence.
ActionId should match one from the participant's options.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Actor.ChoreographyAction.ActionId
member.summary:
Action identifier matching one from the actor's options.
Examples: "sword_slash", "dodge_roll", "taunt"

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Actor.ChoreographyAction.TargetId
member.summary:
Target actor ID for the action, if applicable.
Null for untargeted actions like movement or taunts.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Actor.ChoreographyAction.Position
member.summary: Target position for movement or placement actions

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Actor.ChoreographyAction.DurationMs
member.summary:
Expected duration in milliseconds.
Used for timing subsequent actions and sync points.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Actor.ChoreographyAction.Style
member.summary:
Stylistic modifier for the action (e.g., "dramatic", "desperate", "confident").
Actors may adjust animation/presentation based on style.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Actor.ChoreographyAction.DelayMs
member.summary:
Delay before starting this action (relative to previous action completion).
Allows precise timing within sequences.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Actor.ChoreographyAction.AdditionalProperties
member.summary: Gets or sets additional properties not defined in the schema.

member.name: T:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Actor.ChoreographyTiming
member.summary: Controls when a choreographed sequence should begin execution

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Actor.ChoreographyTiming.StartAt
member.summary:
When to start executing the sequence.
- immediate: Start as soon as instruction received
- after_previous: Start after current action completes
- sync_point: Wait for specified sync point event

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Actor.ChoreographyTiming.SyncPointId
member.summary:
Sync point to wait for (required when startAt=sync_point).
Examples: "attack_landed", "guard_raised", "combo_ready"

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Actor.ChoreographyTiming.MaxWaitMs
member.summary:
Maximum time to wait for sync point in milliseconds.
If exceeded, sequence may start anyway or be cancelled.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Actor.ChoreographyTiming.WindowMs
member.summary:
Time window during which the action can start.
Allows for natural timing variation.

member.name: T:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Actor.ChoreographyPriority
member.summary:
How strongly the actor should prefer the choreographed action over their own choices.
- low: Suggestion; actor may ignore if they prefer something else
- normal: Standard choreography; follow unless clearly suboptimal
- high: Important sequence; should follow even if not preferred
- override: Critical moment; must follow unless physically impossible

member.name: T:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Actor.ChoreographyStartCondition
member.summary: When to begin executing a choreographed sequence

member.name: T:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Actor.ChoreographyPosition
member.summary: 3D position for choreography movement and placement actions

member.summary: X coordinate

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Actor.ChoreographyPosition.Y
member.summary: Y coordinate (vertical)

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Actor.ChoreographyPosition.Z
member.summary: Z coordinate

Bundle category:

- metabundle: Composed from other bundles server-side

member.name: T:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Asset.AssetIdStyle
member.summary:
Asset ID validation style presets:
- any: No style enforcement (just max length and basic characters)
- dot_notation: Dot-separated identifiers (e.g., models.characters.hero)
- reverse_dns: Reverse DNS notation (e.g., com.beyondimmersion.arcadia.hero)
- path_style: File path style (e.g., Content/Models/Characters/Hero.sdmodel)
- custom: Use custom regex pattern from configuration

member.summary:
Request to create a metabundle from source bundles and/or standalone assets.
At least one of sourceBundleIds or standaloneAssetIds must be provided.
This enables packaging behaviors/scripts with 3D assets as a complete unit.

member.summary:
Source bundle IDs to pull assets from. Can cherry-pick specific
assets using assetFilter, or include all if assetFilter is null.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Asset.CreateMetabundleRequest.StandaloneAssetIds
member.summary:
Individual asset IDs (not in bundles) to include directly.

alongside bundled 3D assets.

member.name: T:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Auth.SteamVerifyRequest
member.summary:
Request to verify a Steam Session Ticket. The ticket is obtained client-side via
ISteamUser::GetAuthTicketForWebApi("bannou"). SteamID is NOT included because
it must be obtained from Steam's Web API response (never trust client-provided SteamID).

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Auth.SteamVerifyRequest.Ticket
member.summary:
Hex-encoded Steam Session Ticket from ISteamUser::GetAuthTicketForWebApi().
Client converts ticket bytes to hex string: BitConverter.ToString(ticketData).Replace("-", "")

member.summary: Request to compile an ABML behavior definition into executable behavior trees

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Behavior.CompileBehaviorRequest.AbmlContent
member.summary: Raw ABML YAML content to compile

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Behavior.CompileBehaviorRequest.BehaviorName
member.summary:
Optional human-readable name for the behavior.
If not provided, extracted from ABML metadata.id or generated from content hash.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Behavior.CompileBehaviorRequest.BehaviorCategory
member.summary:
Category for organizing behaviors (e.g., profession, cultural, situational).
Used for filtering and grouping in bundles.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Behavior.CompileBehaviorRequest.BundleId
member.summary:
Optional bundle identifier for grouping related behaviors.
When specified, the compiled behavior will be added to a bundle with this ID.
Clients can then download entire bundles for efficient bulk loading.
If the bundle doesn't exist, it will be created.

Higher intensity = higher probability of trait evolution.
Typical values: 0.3 (minor), 0.5 (moderate), 0.8 (major), 1.0 (life-changing)

Optional context for logging and debugging.

Minimal voice metadata returned when joining a session.
**Event-Only Pattern**: Peer connection details are NOT included here.
Clients receive VoicePeerJoinedEvent when other peers join (with their SDP offers).
This avoids race conditions between response processing and event handling.

member.name: T:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Orchestrator.TeardownMode
member.summary:
Teardown mode:
- graceful: Signal shutdown, wait for clean exit
- force: Immediately stop (SIGKILL)
- preserve-data: Keep volumes/networks, remove containers

member.name: T:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Orchestrator.TeardownRequest
member.summary: Request to tear down a deployed environment with options for data preservation

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Orchestrator.TeardownRequest.DryRun
member.summary:
When true, simulates teardown without actually stopping or removing containers.
Returns what would be torn down. ALWAYS use dryRun=true first to preview the impact.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Orchestrator.TeardownRequest.Mode
member.summary: How the teardown should be performed

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Orchestrator.TeardownRequest.Timeout
member.summary: Graceful shutdown timeout in seconds

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Orchestrator.TeardownRequest.RemoveVolumes
member.summary: Also remove associated volumes

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Orchestrator.TeardownRequest.RemoveNetworks
member.summary: Also remove associated networks

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Orchestrator.TeardownRequest.IncludeInfrastructure
member.summary:
When true, also removes support infrastructure (Redis, RabbitMQ, MySQL, etc.).
This is determined by scanning compose files or finding containers in the same
Docker swarm/Kubernetes namespace as bannou services. USE WITH EXTREME CAUTION -
this will destroy all data and require a full re-deployment.

member.name: T:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Orchestrator.ConfigurationChangedEvent
member.summary:
Published by orchestrator when configuration or secrets change.
All containers receive this event via RabbitMQ. Plugins decide if they care
based on the changedKeys prefixes and request restart if needed.
Topic: bannou-configuration-events

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Orchestrator.ConfigurationChangedEvent.EventId
member.summary: Unique identifier for this event instance

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Orchestrator.ConfigurationChangedEvent.Timestamp
member.summary: When this configuration change occurred

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Orchestrator.ConfigurationChangedEvent.ConfigVersion
member.summary: Monotonically increasing version number

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Orchestrator.ConfigurationChangedEvent.ChangedKeys
member.summary:
Configuration keys that changed (not values for security).
Key prefixes indicate scope:
- "auth.*" - Authentication-related
- "database.*" - Database connections
- "mesh.*" - Mesh components (typically global impact)
- "connect.*" - WebSocket/connection settings

member.name: T:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Orchestrator.RestartPriority
member.summary:
Restart urgency level:
- graceful: Rolling update, wait for healthy before cycling next instance
- immediate: Rolling update but don't wait for connection drain
- force: Kill all instances simultaneously (causes downtime)

member.name: T:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Relationship.EntityType
member.summary:
Type of entity in a relationship.
- CHARACTER: Player-controlled characters
- NPC: Non-player characters
- MONSTER: Hostile or neutral creatures
- ITEM: Physical objects, artifacts, etc.
- LOCATION: Places, regions, buildings
- ORGANIZATION: Guilds, companies, groups
- FACTION: Political or social factions
- REALM: Game realms/worlds
- SOUL: Immortal soul entity for reincarnation chains
- OTHER: Catch-all for future entity types

member.summary: Type of entity that owns this save slot

member.name: T:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.SaveLoad.SaveCategory
member.summary:
Category of save with predefined behaviors.
QUICK_SAVE: Single-slot fast save, overwritten frequently (max 1 version).
AUTO_SAVE: System-triggered periodic saves (max 5 versions, rolling).
MANUAL_SAVE: User-initiated named saves (max 10 versions, no auto-cleanup).
CHECKPOINT: Progress markers (max 20 versions, rolling).
STATE_SNAPSHOT: Full state captures for debugging (max 3 versions, rolling).

member.name: T:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.SaveLoad.DeltaAlgorithm
member.summary:
Algorithm used for delta computation.
JSON_PATCH: RFC 6902, best for structured JSON data
BSDIFF: Binary diff, good for general binary data
XDELTA: RFC 3284 VCDIFF, efficient for large binary files

Scene classification for querying and validation rule lookup.

Structural node type. Indicates what kind of data the node contains,
not how it will be used at runtime. Consumers interpret nodes according
to their own needs via tags and annotations.

member.name: T:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Scene.AttachmentPoint

Example: A wall may have attachment points for paintings, shelves, or light fixtures.

P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.State.QueryStateRequest.IndexName

Redis search index name. Defaults to "{storeName}-idx".

RedisSearch query string (e.g., "@name:John", "@age:[18 +inf]", "*").

member.name: T:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Subscription.QueryCurrentSubscriptionsRequest
member.summary:
Request to query current active subscriptions.
Provide accountId to get subscriptions for a specific account,
or stubName to get all accounts subscribed to a specific service,
or both to check if a specific account is subscribed to a specific service.
At least one of accountId or stubName must be provided.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Subscription.QueryCurrentSubscriptionsRequest.AccountId
member.summary: ID of the account to get current subscriptions for. Optional if stubName is provided.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Subscription.QueryCurrentSubscriptionsRequest.StubName
member.summary: Stub name of the service to filter by (e.g., "arcadia"). Returns all accounts subscribed to this service.
